Verses: 1 ivaigalukkuppinbu, Paralogaththil Thiralaana Janakkoottam Idugira Aaravaaraththaik Ketten. Avargal: Allelooyaa, Ratchaniyamum Magimaiyum Ganamum Vallamaiyum Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiyakarththarukke Uriyadhu; Avarudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugal Saththiyamum Needhiyumaanavaigal.
2 than Vesiththanaththinaal Boomiyaikkeduththa Magaa Vesikku Avar Niyaayaththeerppukkoduththu, Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararin Raththaththirkaaga Avalidaththil Pazhivaanginaare Endraargal.
3 marubadiyum Avargal: Allelooyaa Endru Solli Aarppariththaargal. Avaludaiya Pugai Endrendraikkum Ezhumbugiradhu Endraargal.
4 irubaththunaangu Mooppargalum, Naangu Jeevangalum Vanakkamaai Vizhundhu: Aamen, Allelooyaa, Endru Solli, Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkum Dhevanaith Thozhudhukondaargal.
5 melum, Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Oozhiyakkaarare, Avarukkup Bayappadugira Siriyorum Periyorumaanavargale, Neengal Yaavarum Avaraith Thudhiyungal Endru Oru Saththam Singaasanaththilirundhu Pirandhadhu.

6 appozhudhu Thiralaana Janangal Idum Aaravaarampolavum, Peruvella Iraichchalpolavum, Balaththa Idimuzhakkampolavum, Oru Saththamundaagi: Allelooyaa, Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevanaagiya Karththarraajyabaarampannugiraar.
7 naam Sandhoshappattuk Kalikoorndhu Avarukkuth Thudhiseluththakkadavom. Aattukkuttiyaanavarudaiya Kaliyaanam Vandhadhu, Avarudaiya Manaivi Thannai Aayaththampanninaal Endru Sollak Ketten.
8 suththamum Piragaasamumaana Melliya Vasthiram Thariththukkollumpadi Avalukku Alikkappattadhu; Andha Melliyavasthiram Parisuththavaangaludaiya Needhigale.

9 pinnum, Avan Ennai Nokki: Aattukkuttiyaanavarin Kaliyaana Virundhukku Azhaikkappattavargal Baakkiyavaangal Endrezhudhu Endraan. Melum, Ivaigal Dhevanudaiya Saththiyamaana Vasanangal Endru Ennudane Sonnaan.

10 appozhudhu Avanai Vanangumpadi Avanudaiya Paadhaththil Vizhundhen. Avan Ennai Nokki: Ippadich Seyyaadhapadikkup Paar; Unnodum Yesuvaikkuriththuch Saatchiyitta Sagodhararodungooda Naanum Oru Oozhiyakkaaran; Dhevanaith Thozhudhukol. Yesuvaippatrina Saatchi Theerkkadharisanaththin Aaviyaayirukkiradhu Endraan.

11 pinbu, Paralogam Thirandhirukkakkanden; Idho, Oru Vellaikkudhirai Kaanappattadhu, Adhinmel Eriyirundhavar Unmaiyum Saththiyamumullavarennappattavar; Avar Needhiyaai Niyaayandheerththu Yuththampannugiraar.
12 avarudaiya Kangal Akkinijuvaalaiyaippolirundhana, Avarudaiya Sirasinmel Anega Kireedangal Irundhana; Avarukkeyandri Veroruvarukkun Theriyaadha Oru Naamamum Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.
13 raththaththil Thoikkappatta Vasthiraththaith Thariththirundhaar; Avarudaiya Naamam Dhevanudaiya Vaarththaienbadhe.
14 paralogaththilulla Senaigal Venmaiyum Suththamumaana Melliya Vasthirandhariththavargalaai, Vellaikkudhiraigalinmel Eri, Avarukkup Pinsendraargal.

15 purajaadhigalai Vettumpadikku Avarudaiya Vaayilirundhu Koormaiyaana Pattayam Purappadugiradhu; Iruppukkolaal Avargalai Arasaaluvaar; Avar Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevanudaiya Ukkirakobamaagiya Madhuvulla Aalaiyai Midhikkiraar.
16 raajaadhi Raajaa, Karththaadhi Karththaa Ennum Naamam Avarudaiya Vasthiraththinmelum Avarudaiya Thodaiyinmelum Ezhudhappattirundhadhu.
17 pinbu Oru Thoodhan Sooriyanil Nirkakkanden; Avan Vaanaththin Maththiyil Parakkira Sagala Paravaigalaiyum Paarththu:

18 neengal Raajaakkalin Maamsaththaiyum, Senaiththalaivargalin Maamsaththaiyum, Balavaangalin Maamsaththaiyum, Kudhiraigalin Maamsaththaiyum, Avaigalinmel Eriyirukkiravargalin Maamsaththaiyum, Suyaadheenar Adimaigal, Siriyor Periyor, Ivargalellaarudaiya Maamsaththaiyum Patchikkumpadikku, Magaadhevan Kodukkum Virundhukkuk Koodivaarungal Endru Migundha Saththaththode Kooppittaan.
19 pinbu, Mirugamum Boomiyin Raajaakkalum Avargaludaiya Senaigalum, Kudhiraiyinmel Eriyirukkiravarodum Avarudaiya Senaiyodum Yuththampannumpadikkuk Koodivarakkanden.

20 appozhudhu Mirugam Pidikkappattadhu; Mirugaththin Munbaagach Seydha Arpudhangalaal Adhin Muththiraiyaith Thariththavargalaiyum Adhin Soroobaththai Vananginavargalaiyum Mosampokkina Kallaththeerkkadharisiyungoodap Pidikkappattaan; Iruvarum Gandhagam Erigira Akkinikkadalile Uyirode Thallappattaargal.
21 matravargal Kudhiraiyinmel Erinavarudaiya Vaayilirundhu Purappadugira Pattayaththaal Kollappattaargal; Avargaludaiya Maamsaththinaal Paravaigal Yaavum Thirupdhiyadaindhana.
